dashboard.description:
# Desktop satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall desktop satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Overall speed * Stability: weather it crashes * Monitor size * Noise level * Storage * OS * Startup time
**We measure:** * Hardware resources * Stability * Startup * Storage * System
:::tip The second part of the dashboard allows you to understand which desktop models are most popular. :::
:::configuration Edit device category [Desktop Model](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Desktop%20model&Type=device) to define the breakdown for the model comparison. :::
dashboard.name: Devices: desktops

barChartConfig.title: Would users prefer a laptop instead of their desktop?

dashboard.description: Here we can see a side-by-side comparison of the two most successful laptops of the laptop hardware trial.
dashboard.name: Devices: laptop finalists

dashboard.description:
# Laptop satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall laptop satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Overall speed * Stability: whether it crashes * Size * Noise level * Weight * Battery life * Storage * OS * Startup time
**We measure:** * Hardware resources * Stability * Startup * Storage * System
:::tip The second part of the dashboard allows you to understand which laptop models are most popular. :::
:::configuration Edit device category [Laptop Model](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Laptop%20model&Type=device) to define the breakdown for the model comparison. :::
dashboard.name: Devices: laptops

barChartConfig.title: Would user prefer a desktop instead of their laptop?

tableConfig.title: What users do for business with their mobile device

dashboard.description:
# IT documentation satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall IT documentation satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Ease to find * Ease to undertand * Helpfulness
dashboard.name: IT team: documentation

dashboard.description:
# IT help desk satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall IT help desk satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Efficiency * Speed * Friendliness * Understandibility: capacity to be understood by users * Understanding: capacity to understand users' issues
dashboard.name: IT team: help desk

metric.label: IT help desk satisfaction - Happiness breakdown
IT help desk satisfaction - Positive points
IT help desk satisfaction - Negative points

barChartConfig.title: What users do when they have a problem

dashboard.description:
# Meeting rooms satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall meeting rooms satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Availability * Distance * Capacity * A/V equipment
dashboard.name: Infra: meeting rooms

dashboard.description:
# Network satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall network satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Overall speed * Wi-Fi: coverage, reliability and accessibility with private devices * Connectivity
**We measure:** * Ethernet/Wifi connectivity * Ethernet/Wifi response time
dashboard.name: Infra: network

dashboard.description:
# Printing satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall printing satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Ease of use * Overall reliability * Overall speed * Quality * Distance to printer
dashboard.name: Infra: printing

dashboard.description:
# Storage satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall storage satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Ease of use * Overall reliability * Capacity * Access rights
**We measure:** * Connectivity * Response time
dashboard.name: Services: SMB

dashboard.description:
# Email satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall email satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Ease of use * Overall speed * Overall reliability * Amount of spam * Amount of storage
**We measure:** * Connectivity * Response time * Stability
:::tip The second part of the dashboard allows you to understand which email client version is more appreciated. :::
:::configuration Edit binary category [Email version](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Email%20version&Type=binary) to define the breakdown for the version comparison. :::
dashboard.name: Services: email

dashboard.description:
# Software satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall software satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Version * Overall speed * Overall stability * Ease-of-use
**We measure:** * Number of packages * Software age * Stability
dashboard.name: Services: software

barChartConfig.title: Do users have all the software they need?

dashboard.description:
# Unified communication satisfaction This dashboard presents information about overall unified communication satisfaction and allows to understand which factors are impacting satisfaction the most.
**We ask users about:** * Ease of use * Overall reliability * Features
**We measure:** * Connectivity * Response time * Stability
:::tip The second part of the dashboard allows you to understand which unified communication client version is more appreciated. :::
:::configuration Edit binary category [Unified communication version](nxt://Edit-NxCategory?Encoding=Url&Name=Unified%20communication%20version&Type=binary) to define the breakdown for the version comparison. :::
dashboard.name: Services: unified communication
